dashboard.title: WebTop dashboard
dashboard.error_reading_webtop5_configuration: Error al leer la configuración de WebTop 5
dashboard.change_default_password: The default password for the admin user is 'admin'. Please change it as soon as possible from WebTop application to avoid security issues!

docs.DefaultToolbarIconsSize: Dimension of the toolbar icons, available values: small, medium, large. Default is medium.
docs.SmtpAuth: If set to enabled, it enables authentication for user sessions SMTP send. Default is disabled.
docs.SmtpStarttls: If set to enabled, it enables STARTTLS SMTP send. Default is disabled.
docs.PublicUrl: Public URL used to publish resources for the cloud. If not set, default is http://FQDN/webtop.
docs.DavServerUrl: DAV server URL for CalDAV and CardDAV clients configuration. If not set, default is https://FQDN/webtop-dav/server.php.
docs.PbxProviderNethvoiceWebrestUrl: NethVoice base url for API calls, used when PbxProvider is set to nethvoice.
docs.MinMemory: Minimum memory of Tomcat instance. Value is expressed in MB.
docs.MaxMemory: Maximum memory of Tomcat instance. Value is expressed in MB.
docs.VirtualHost:
Alias to WebTop application and related services.

It can be used to access WebTop and configure ActiveSync/CalDAV/CardDAV clients.

Virtual host is used in download URLs (unless Public URL has been defined) and in calendar/addressbook URLs (unless DAV server URL has been defined).
docs.JitsiUrl: URL of Jisi Meet server configured for meetings
